title: 3.2 Master Challenge 2
question: Create a new repository for the To-do list project and initialize it with a README file. Set up a basic project board with the Todo, In Progress, and Done columns. Create a list of tasks related to the project and assign them to team members.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
